name: Shuten Doji [Bridegroom]
skill: Deals 1743/2083 DMG to all enemies, with a moderate chance of inflicting Poison.
ability: Sharply increases all allies' Crit DMG when this daemon is Team Leader.
Increases own level by 10 when Dojigiri Yasutsuna is on the team.

additional_data.description: The spirit of the demon leader of Mount Oe. His feelings for his beloved Dojigiri Yasutsuna triggered an evil energy outbreak, and they had to throw together a last-minute wedding to deal with it. Although there was no ceremony in the end, the two talked their feelings over, and reaffirmed their vows to make each other happy. He also vowed in secret to earn her father's approval before the day they really do get married.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Romance of the Demon and Sword" Event: Get a First Half Ranking of 2500 and above.
◦ "Romance of the Demon and Sword" Event: Get a Second Half Ranking of 2500 and above.
◦ "Romance of the Demon and Sword" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 5000 and above.

main: "Yes, yes. I've already been made well aware."
